data.actual_result: Step 2: "foo bar" is displayed (all newlines are visually replaced with spaces)
data.expected_result: Step 2: a two line message is displayed, with foo being the first line, and bar being the second
data.short_description: New lines in the "notes" field are not displayed
data.steps_to_repro: - On desktop, add a multi-line note to someone's profile (shift-enter helps). For example: "foo\nbar" - View their profile on Android
